description.value: Code system of concepts used to describe acceptable start and end times, as well as days of the week, for appointment or resource scheduling. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the SCV and APR segments.

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0294 (Time Selection Criteria Parameter Class Codes)

copyright.value: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

description.value: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

display.value: The preferred start time for the appointment request, service or resource. Any legal time specification in the format HHMM, using 24-hour clock notation

definition.value: The preferred start time for the appointment request, service or resource. Any legal time specification in the format HHMM, using 24-hour clock notation

valueString.value: In component 2, specify any valid time in the format HHMM, using 24-hour clock notation where HH = hour and MM = minutes

display.value: An indicator that there is a preferred start time for the appointment request, service or resource.

definition.value: An indicator that there is a preferred start time for the appointment request, service or resource.

display.value: The preferred end time for the appointment request, service or resource. Any legal time specification in the format HHMM, using 24-hour clock notation

definition.value: The preferred end time for the appointment request, service or resource. Any legal time specification in the format HHMM, using 24-hour clock notation

valueString.value: In component 2, specify any valid time in the format HHMM, using 24-hour clock notation where HH = hour and MM = minutes

display.value: An indicator that there is a preferred end time for the appointment request, service or resource.

definition.value: An indicator that there is a preferred end time for the appointment request, service or resource.

display.value: An indicator that Monday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur. OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferred

definition.value: An indicator that Monday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur. OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferred

valueString.value:
In component 2, specify OK or NO.

OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferred

display.value: An indicator that Monday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.

definition.value: An indicator that Monday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.
